ygData.subject: Re: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There was one kind of dread wolf that wasn t despawning properly when daylight came around. On my server they said the undead are gone, but they will be
ygData.messageBody:
>The way I understood it, any nighttime undead that weren't
>killed hung around through daytime.

There was one kind of 'dread wolf' that wasn't despawning properly when
daylight came around.

On my server they said the undead are gone, but 'they will be back with a
vengeance' or something.

I'm willing to bet they will just make some minor changes, like fixing the
dread wolves.

>Kithicor and Rivervale
>are the only places for rangers and druids to train if they
>base out of Freeport. So putting level 40+ mobs in Kithicor
>really limits the playability and locale options for certain
>classes.


This isn't a big deal in my opinion, honestly, because we just got this GM
like a few weeks ago. So to make him a little harder to get to isn't so much
of a big deal. Many of us have gone 35 levels without having a GM in
Kithicor - we had to run to Surefall or Kelethin every time we wanted to
train or buy spells - the new rangers should be so spoiled as to think
Verant OWES us one there. ;)

Daleia
